text: Ischnochiton comptus is a medium-sized polyplacophoran mollusc in the family Ischnochitonidae. The species is 30 mm in size. ==Distribution== Mainly distributed in the North Pacific region, such as: South Korea, Taiwan, Mainland China, Japan especially in central Honshu. Can be seen on rocks in intertidal zone and neritic zone. ==See also== * Ischnochiton boninensis ==References== comptus Category:Chitons described in 1859
title: Ischnochiton comptus
